title: "Chalked Up: CCBC receives federal funding for robotics programs; schools get garden grants"
excerpt: "Officials from the Community College of Beaver County have announced that they will receive $1.7 million in federal funding over the next four years, which will support the school's outreach programs and introduce a variety of new robotics courses at the school."
